values:
*stares*
Smeg head
*stares*
I think im back....maybeh.
got eaten by 2 mmorpgs....2 jobs... and a large pizza ><
fell off the face of the planet, quit ren faire, just wasnt fun anymore. workin at the bar killed my love of goin out, winchesters, great place....the clientel just got on my nerves. still dealin with work bs tho,
nothin like bein in the same place after takin over 3 persons worth of responsibilities ><; meh, nuff ramblin for now.

nother fun night at the bar, hoping to go home with someone...I did but she neglected to tell me she had a boi, Ive had it happen to me, so ah aint goin down throu it, she was an old freind from high school, wanted to enjoy her company fer awhile now, but shes just to daft, sides how blunt is wanna take me home? anyways, Blah, just lookin for some good quality time, cause im a giver, wink

Here I sit, a free man, finally gathered most my senses after a draining relationship with a turbocaste. oh well, I am now free to look, to feel, and to be. I can enjoy my home, and my friends. No longer do I have to worry bout the one behind me, who told me constantly how i was going to cheat on her, Cheat? with what energy, I work 2 jobs plus i have to feed her and watch her like a frickin child. gadzuks. Oh well, at least on the plus side i dont have the entire female species pissed off at me about it, thankfully alot of em sided with me. Slowly healing from another bad move on the ankle but back to work finally. money good. plus I can do FAIRE again YEah I can go places i have money again, Now if only i can go to the bar and hot have to work...lol

Finally things are winding down some. Moving is hectic. but now at least there is some piece, all thats left is to leave my extended family to drown in the dust of the despair that has been weaved around me by their very hands. Well time to develope well at least try too. fun with 2 jobs still, never thought i'd be workin at a bar tho, tis good tho, lovet the job more than the one i've been doin for 5-years. Got a girl whos completely insane...damm i love it. if im lucky she wont kill me...much. haha... shes mah loooney. {tosses a flaming sword accross the room}}} mmm that felt good. Well now that i have some freedom hopefully i can get some actual projects done and see some old friends now. [[[vanishes into warp gate}}}

Alas love...was in the air...and too that all I can say is POP THE HORNS BABY!! Slowly I realize that consoles are fun for games, well mainly cause my mainframe is now plauged by the dreaded beep crash. so no angry mages for me. MMM angry magic. hehe. Lookin forward to a new season of faire tho,  Still tryin to figure out a bio for my char that does not involve crashed starships or daemons... mmm daemons. the angry ones are the friendliest right. been attempting to cure my hunger for hack and slash but its not satied yet...dab nabbit.

Life life life... nuttin like sortin through 7 years of grim fanagled mixes of sci-fi fantasy low rung to uber-sized tech trees and concepts. mmm...concepts. thankfully I finally got a chance to fall back into existance. slowly dealing with the world, damm this race should have been off this planet ages ago. Oh well ive been off my rocker for ages now...mostly because I probally modded it into something plasharmonic or fire breathing... I miss the dragons. {{ starts assembling something from parts in coat}} I mean cmon this world has soo many myths and legends, doesnt anyone beleave any of them were actually real [[ finishes building a gigantic cannon only to panic fast enough to place an anti-grav unit on it before it crushes hisself]] whew. [[tosses it in the background]] eh. if only i could do that for a livin eh? bloody hell look at me, everyone thought I was goin to blow up the world and here I am installing fire sprinkler systems for my uncle scrooge. bah. {{looks around franticly and vanishes]]

[[falls out of portal]]
   Well Im here..well at least I be beleave I'm here, lol for the first time but not for the last time. well it was nearly a waste of a day... family gatherings need not mention more. Thankfully I got kidnapped half=way in. yay! After a quick break wit sanity, yes I conferred with sanity.. still not sure whose sanity tho [[winks]] I don't think mine dresses like that. Waitin for somethin big to happen in this town. especially if it involves Force 4-D or ren faire...mmmm ren faire.... I am the Smiling Gryphon. hmmm... caffine supply destabling. must shut body down for now. Ill twitch some more later.
